Resell Track [iOS app]

An iOS app written by SwiftUI that works on iPhones, iPads and Macs. Resell Track helps users organise purchased items, track their value, and record sales.

Scuba Diving Calculation Assistant App [Software Development Project]

A Java application designed to automate some simple and complex calculations that are common in the dive industry. The GUI was created from a text-based prototype using Apache NetBeans. Junit was used for unit testing.
